attributes.action: Enforce stricter anti-bullying rules in every school in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Make stricter bullying rules in schools in the UK.
Bullying ruins people's lives and schools and local councils do not seem to be doing enough about it.
This petition is trying to get the law changed in the UK (inc. Scotland) to make bullying laws stricter to try and stop bullying in every form there is.
